map.legendDescription: Per capita mismanaged plastic waste (per person per day)

title: Per capita mismanaged plastic waste
subtitle: Daily per capita generation of mismanaged plastic waste in coastal communities, measured in kilograms per person per day. Coastal population is based on those who live within 50km of a coastal water. The authors define mismanaged waste as "mismanaged waste is material that is either littered or inadequately disposed. Inadequately disposed waste is not formally managed and includes disposal in dumps or open, uncontrolled landfills, where it is not fully contained."
